data.title: Now Playing
data.meta_description: Dinner and a Movie like you've never had before! New Movies! Retro vibes! Celebrating 75 Years! SC's Favorite Auto Theater
data.meta_site_name:
The 25 Drive In Movie Theater
77 Years in the Making
data.text:
We are open for the 2024 Season. Open every Friday and Saturday! The movies will be posted Monday!

See you at the Drive In!

$10 age 12 and up, $5 age 3-11.

You get to see the two movies on one Screen!

Screen One:

8:30 DEADPOOL & WOLVERINE R

10:45 LONG LEGS R

SPECIAL! APPLEWOOD SMOKED BACON CHEESEBURGER

WITH CHILI CHEESE FRIES

Screen Two:

8:30 HAROLD AND THE PURPLE CRAYON PG

10:05 INSIDE OUT 2 PG

Screen Three:

8:30 TWISTERS PG-13

10:35 BAD BOYS:RIDE OR DIE R

IT'S A WHOLE EVENING OF ENTERTAINMENT!

IT'S DINNER AND A MOVIE LIKE YOU'VE NEVER HAD BEFORE!

ALL AT THE 25 DRIVE IN THEATER

GATE will OPEN 7:00 on Friday, and Saturday

HAND PATTIED BURGERS! HOUSE MADE BARBECUE SANDWICHES!

Every Drive In is different. We are known as the Drive In that will cook for you!

POWERED BY VYVE - Our choice for fast, reliable communication

Mosquito Authority - solving all of our bug needs! 864-992-1305

Want to hold your event at the Drive in??? Call us at 864-554-1272 and leave a message.
